oakhaven.name: Oakhaven
oakhaven.description: A peaceful village nestled in a clearing. The smell of fresh bread fills the air.

whispering_woods.name: Whispering Woods
whispering_woods.description: A dense forest where the trees seem to whisper secrets. It's easy to get lost here.

goblin_cave.name: Goblin Cave
goblin_cave.description: A dark and damp cave, home to a clan of mischievous goblins.
goblin_cave.hazard_description: A foul stench hangs in the air.

conditional_exits.description: A faint shimmering in the eastern wall hints at a hidden passage.

hidden_shrine.name: Hidden Shrine
hidden_shrine.description: A small, circular chamber made of polished white stone. Intricate carvings cover the walls, depicting celestial scenes. A single pedestal stands in the center.

ashen_peaks.name: The Ashen Peaks
ashen_peaks.description: A desolate landscape of black rock and rivers of magma. The air is thick with smoke and ash, and the ground is hot to the touch.

sunken_swamp.name: The Sunken Swamp
sunken_swamp.description: Ancient, moss-covered ruins jut out from murky water. A testament to a long-forgotten civilization that thrived here before the land was flooded. The air is thick with the smell of decay.
sunken_swamp.hidden_description: A thick, cloying fog hangs heavy in the air, obscuring the details of this murky swamp. It's too dark to see clearly. You'll need a light source to explore properly.

old_man_willow.name: Old Man Willow
old_man_willow.dialogue: Hmph. The world isn't as quiet as it used to be.

healing_potion_1.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion_1.description: A simple potion that restores 10 health.

lantern_1.name: Lantern
lantern_1.description: An old lantern that casts a steady light.

waterlogged_chest_1.name: Waterlogged Chest
waterlogged_chest_1.description: A heavy, waterlogged chest. It seems to be unlocked.

magic_scroll_1.name: Magic Scroll
magic_scroll_1.description: A scroll that unleashes a bolt of energy.

scorched_tablet_1.name: Scorched Tablet
scorched_tablet_1.description: A tablet covered in ancient, scorched carvings. It tells a fragment of the story of a civilization that worshipped the volcano.

obsidian_fragment_1.name: Obsidian Fragment
obsidian_fragment_1.description: A sharp, black volcanic glass shard.

fireproof_armor_1.name: Fireproof Armor
fireproof_armor_1.description: A suit of armor made from strange, heat-resistant scales. It provides protection from extreme heat.

fire_resistance_potion_1.name: Fire Resistance Potion
fire_resistance_potion_1.description: A potion that grants temporary resistance to fire.

amulet_of_seeing_1.name: Amulet of Seeing
amulet_of_seeing_1.description: A strange amulet that hums with a faint energy. It seems to reveal things that are hidden.

ancient_tome_1.name: Ancient Tome
ancient_tome_1.description: A heavy book filled with cryptic writings about the world's creation.
